cast.name: 伊克巴尔·拉马丹 Iqbaal Dhiafakhri Ramadhan

introduction: December 22, 1990, Dilan and Milea officially date. Amid their happiness Dilan threatened to be fired from school due to a fight with Anhar. Dilan also increasingly involves in fights and gets enemies. Milea is worried about Dilan's future. Milea feels that she has the right to ban Dilan from being involved in a motorcycle gang. One day, Dilan is attacked by unknown people. When he knows who is doing it, Dilan is planning revenge. Milea finally asks Dilan to stop from the motorcycle gang or their relationship ends. Dilan, a combat commander and motorcycle gang leader, will always be in trouble. In the midst of all these problems, Yugo, the son of a distant cousin of Milea's father who has just returned from Belgium meets Milea. They often spend time together. Yugo likes Milea. And Milea - only loves Dilan.
